This class will be used to manage the academic portion size for the extra products implements the interface ExtraMealSizeable to apply Open Closed principle.

This class contains the client information to be used on the invoice The class has the attributes of the client name, nit and email
ClientController
Class to receive and validate the information from the client for the invoice The class sets iu elements and events to receive the name, nit or email from the client if he or she wants to provide them the class uses regular expressions to verify each field
